participant_1.background:
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
i love the smell of leather.
i have trouble losing weight.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.

participant_2.background:
I want to show my music to the world!
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm excited to start a new band.
Oh that's awesome! I hope it goes well. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music. I love to play country, rock, and blues.
That sounds really cool. I love listening to music. I went to the bakery yesterday and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
Wow, that sounds delicious! I love cookies. I have trouble losing weight, so I have to be careful about what I eat.
I know what you mean. I have the same problem. I love food too much.
I know, right? It's so hard to resist.
I went to the aquarium last week and saw a blue whale. It was amazing!
Wow, that sounds like an amazing experience. I've always wanted to see a blue whale.
It was! I'm glad I got to see it.
I'm going to go now. Have a great day!
